name: Darkroom Essentials and  Processes
description: This introductory class covers all of the key basics in Black and White Darkroom printing. Learn the essential steps and key processes to get you on your way to printing your images! Students will gain the techniques to grow in skill and confidence. Instructor will go over the needed materials in the first class. This class can be taken in lieu of Photography Center Orientation.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
